overview: When an ing√©nue heads to America to find fame and fortune in Hollywood, her mother does what any normal red-blooded European mother would do: she puts a hit out on a gaggle of porn stars to discourage her daughter from going XXX. Join adult's hottest brunette bombshell Lanny Barby in Burnt Fury, the new Vivid romp that's part police story and part "Story of 'O'". Guaranteed to spring you, from wherever you are.
tagline: Whatcha Gonna Do When They Come For You?
title: Burnt Fury
